item.description:
Within us, there is a great desire to grow in consciousness and progress toward the soul's goal, which is union with God. The soul is aware of where we are internally not yet aligned with functioning to our fullest potential and does everything it can to reach that potential. When we have the opportunity to commit to something that will change our level of consciousness and our lives, the saboteur arises within us. He wants us to slip into unconsciousness, failing, and proving we are worthless. Unconsciousness may look like sleepiness, procrastination, or fear, to name a few. However, the saboteur can make you stronger, more convicted in your action and more ready and alert to act. It gives you the opportunity to stand for the change you want and make it solid in your whole being. Come and learn from Mother Clare Watts, Christian Master, how to turn around and make your relationship to this force in your life be one of strengthening and empowerment.
*****************************************
About Mother Clare

Mother Clare is a mystic; ordained priest; Master Teacher of Christian mysticism; and co-director of a mystical Christian Order, a school with 15 Centers of Light in cities across the country. She holds a Master's Degree in Counseling Psychology, with extensive post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, is a Certified Professional Midwife, and has enjoyed successful careers in both fields. She is the mother of four grown children, and currently lives in Dolores, Colorado, where she co-directs the effort to develop the Sophia Peace Center. She is the author of Giving Birth To God: A Woman's Path To Enlightenment.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Seminar: Self-Sabotage: The Myth of the Victim Mentality
